title: Group portrait including Wilhelmina Byrd Brown wearing pearl necklace, Etta Hawkins, Ruth King, Louise Kent, hostess; Winnie Houston, seated in back; Toki Schalk Johnson, leaning on hand; Ruth Wright, Winnie Nickens, seated on left at front table; Lucille Cuthbert, Jayne McDaniel, Ethel Ramos Harris, wearing jacket with fur collar; Marge Harris, wearing fur hat; Gladys Harris, Peggy Oweido, Florence Byrd Duke, and Hazel Garland, back facing; seated around card tables for bridge luncheon in Hilton Hotel, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
